column4: I am running Ubuntu Server 5.10, but it is not upgrading my linux-image-686??  Any ideas?
I have tried aptitude update and upgrade, but it still holds back linux-image-686 and linux-testricted-modules-686!!
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade will update kernel image
i have done it without dist-upgrade on my personal workstations
im just telling you how i got it
thats weird because it usually updates without dist-upgrade
if it doesnt upgrade what do you lose 3 secs?
alot has been weird with this kernel
yes, the point is WHY it doesnt work with normal upgrade
i dont know and the 12-10 kernel
its fine now i think but i had grub issues and couldnt configure it so i reinstalled ubuntu and works fine now
